alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:49AM CDT until April 13 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1248 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Millikin to near Alsatia to 6 miles southeast of Bakers, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Grace, Eagle Bend and Fitler around 105 AM CDT. Onward around 110 AM CDT. Rolling Fork, Valley Park, Anguilla and Nitta Yuma around 115 AM CDT. Vicksburg around 125 AM CDT. Bovina around 145 AM CDT. Flowers around 150 AM CDT. Youngton around 155 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mayersville and Cary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central, northwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
